rule.ruleDesc: Send Notfication in a Month before Expired
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expiration Date in CurrentRecord != Expiration Date in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Expiration Date">expiration</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Expiration Date">expiration</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send Notfication in a Month before Expired (when ( Expiration Date in CurrentRecord != Expiration Date in SavedRecord))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"runScheduledAction","calcType":"2","calcField":"expiration","calcInterval":"-30 00:00:00","calcScript":"var expiration = record[\"expiration\"];\u000aif (expiration.getMonth() == 0)\u000a actionExecutionTime = new Date(expiration.getFullYear() - 1, 11, expiration.getDate(), expiration.getHours(), expiration.getMinutes(), expiration.getSeconds())\u000aelse {\u000a actionExecutionTime = new Date(expiration.getFullYear(), expiration.getMonth() - 1, expiration.getDate(), expiration.getHours(), expiration.getMinutes(), expiration.getSeconds())\u000a}","actionConditionXml":"","actionCondition":"true","rulesetName":"slm.agreement.will.expire.notification","action":"0"}
